info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 4:54PM EDT until August 04 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Columbia County in east central New York... Southern Albany County in east central New York... Greene County in east central New York... South central Schoharie County in east central New York... Southwestern Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 454 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Westerlo to 6 miles southeast of Preston Hollow to near Windham, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hudson, Catskill, Chatham, Claverack, Livingston, New Baltimore, Westerlo, Ravena, Coxsackie, Clermont, Valatie, Windham, Athens, Philmont, Kinderhook, Lorenz Park, North-South Lake Campground, Claverack-Red Mills, Preston Hollow and Preston-Potter Hollow. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
